name: Stickman City Sniper Shooting
description:
Get ready for the thrill, action, and suspense with Stickman Warriors Fight adventure game. Become a stickman killer and get engage with city mafia, utilize your stickman gun shooter, stickman fighting skills to complete the objectives in time as a professional stick fighter. In this game, you will have to kill your enemy with stickman fighting expertise in stickman fight, also you have to tactically plan your location as a stickman gun shooter, stickman killer to stop the gangsters from running. You have to move quickly as much you can, and get engage in stickman fight before the timers run out.

In Stickman Warriors Fight you will enter in a city with an objective to quickly kill the gangster, mafia as an expert stickman gun shooter. In stickman fight plan your movements sensibly, you cannot remain hidden for a long time, before the time runs out. In the game, you will get different advanced guns to quickly complete all the mission with stick fighter expertise. The game is full of thrill and action packed levels, requiring expert stickman fighting skills, as stickman killer you have to kill all the objectives in time to complete the level.


Features of Stickman Warriors Fight:

- Addictive Game Play!
- Stunning Graphics & Sounds!
- Several Targets with Missions!
- All levels full of Action, Suspense, and thrill for stick fighter!
- Smooth controls for stickman fight with advanced weapons!
